items.sentence: I always get up earlier than the rest of my family.

How did you figure out Tom was the one that did it?

Tom and Mary have decided to get married in Boston.
Tom has a son named John and a daughter named Mary.
It's to your advantage to learn everything you can.
Sorry, but I'm not very interested in that subject.
You wouldn't go to the dentist when you were a boy.
Tom came here every weekend when he was a teenager.
